title: 10 Takes--Pacific Northwest Writers: Perspectives on Writing
description: From novelists to poets to playwrights, Jennifer Roland interviews a variety of writers who have one thing in common—they have all chosen to make the Pacific Northwest their home. Covering a diversity of disciplines and genres—from comics, fantasy and detective novels to long-form poetry and illustrated children’s series—10 distinguished authors provide unique perspectives about their craft, provide helpful writing advice and tips for success, and share their passion for living and writing in the Pacific Northwest.
author: Jennifer Roland
